name: jazzalicious
description:
the world is dying.  or at least, it looks a lot sadder than it used to.

thankfully, there's hope: with the power of jazz and friendship, maybe you can save the world.

created for the 2021 GMTK game jam, this teeny adventure is created for our team's first ever jam.  we had a lot of fun making it and we hope you enjoy!

controls

e to continue conversation

r to leave conversation

arrow keys to walk around

click character to talk to them
